author: arnetheduck
content: a bit of multinet updates: we've got prysmatic building and connecting fine, and I think sharing blocks - but still no finalization. I haven't had time to investigate. I'm also getting really close with lodestar. lighthouse and trinity are both finalizating nicely. ðŸŽŠ

author: arnetheduck
content: in case anyone wants to compare ssz notes, we've got `ncli` here: https://github.com/status-im/nim-beacon-chain/tree/interop/ncli - there's a little readme to get it built and running - it's very easy. I have to say, the code to run a state transition, cli and all, is pretty neat: https://github.com/status-im/nim-beacon-chain/blob/interop/ncli/ncli_transition.nim ðŸ™‚
